raw: Thyssenkrupp agreed to sell its elevators division to a consortium comprising Advent , Cinven and Germany ’s RAG foundation for 17.2 billion euros in February and is hoping for the money to arrive in June.[nL5N2AR8WM ] Car makers and suppliers have scrambled to shore up their liquidity as car sales in Europe tumbled by more than 50 % in March .

raw: Thyssen is joining some of Germany ’s best - known companies including Lufthansa ( LHAG.DE ) , Adidas ( ADSGn . DE ) , Puma ( PUMG.DE ) that are taking out state - guaranteed loans as part of the federal government ’s aid package to deal with the coronavirus crisis .

raw: Pummelled by ill - fated investments , a downturn in the car market , multiple leadership changes and an overly complex group structure that was tackled too late , Thyssenkrupp ’s shares hit historic lows around 3.2 euros in mid - March .
